column1: A memorial service will be held Tuesday at 8 pm from Harman Funeral Homes & Crematory Inc. (West) 1265 Rock Glen Road
column2: Rock Glen with Pastor Gene Boyer officiating the service. The family will receive friends at the funeral home from 7-8pm.  Interment will take place privately at the convenience of the family.  A memorial dinner will be held Wednesday 6-8 pm at the Towers Catering Hall 1478 Tomhicken Road
